author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Hornby Sees FY ‍Underlying Loss After Tax Larger Than Board's Expectations​
text:
Jan 25 (Reuters) - Hornby Plc:
* FY ‍UNDERLYING LOSS AFTER TAX IS LIKELY TO BE LARGER THAN BOARD‘S EXPECTATIONS​
* ‍SALES PERFORMANCE OVER KEY CHRISTMAS TRADING PERIOD WAS BELOW MANAGEMENT EXPECTATIONS​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Bangalore.newsroom@thomsonreuters.com)
